about.heading: Meet Kaitlyn
about.body: As the youngest of six kids, Iâ€™m used to fighting for my seat at the table and making my voice heard. This attitude, combined with a passion for writing, compelled me toward a career in journalism. Now in my senior year at the University of Illinois, I have worked across all sides of the industry and found a love for broadcast reporting. Every week I anchor and report for multiple live programs at UI7 Newsroom, UIUC's student-run TV news studio. Behind the camera, I've worked  as a producer, director, and graphic editor for our programming. When I'm not on TV, I spend my time at WPGU, UIUC's student-run radio station, where I host a weekly music show.
